version_description: Bug fixes

Get ready for Election Night with ABC News! Sign up for notifications and get the latest updates on national and local races. Also, be sure to tune in on Election Night to see our real-time results map, and live video coverage.

Other bug fixes and improvements:
Speed improvements - our app now loads faster than ever
Bug fixes - fixed an issue that prevented some users from opening the app at night. If you still experience this problem please use the feedback forum in the settings menu to let us know.

Get ready for Election Night with ABC News! Sign up for notifications and get the latest updates on national and local races. Also, be sure to tune in on Election Night to see our real-time results map, and live video coverage.

Other bug fixes and improvements:
Speed improvements - our app now loads faster than ever
Bug fixes - fixed an issue that prevented some users from opening the app at night. If you still experience this problem please use the feedback forum in the settings menu to let us know.

Tap to unmute video on Top Stories
Other UI enhancements and fixes

Other bug fixes and improvements:
Speed improvements - our app now loads faster than ever
Bug fixes - fixed an issue that prevented some users from opening the app at night. If you still experience this problem please use the feedback forum in the settings menu to let us know.
Bug fixes and back end improvements
Article page redesign, along with some bug fixes and stability improvements.

This update includes a new module on our Top Stories page that let's users go in-depth on a topic, whether it's a subject like Politics or a list of stories you can't miss. Also has some bug fixes and minor improvements.

- Improvements to the article page
- Bug fixes and improvements (including an issue where podcast audio and video audio would play at the same time)

Goodbye hashtags, hello topics!
More performance improvements and crash fixes.

As always we love feedback. If you have any notes for us, feel free to send them through the feedback form in the settings menu.
We fixed the issue where ads would occasionally start with audio, annoying everyone (including us)
Background enhancements and updates to make the app perform better

Background enhancements and updates to make the app perform better

FIXED a bug that was causing the app to crash for some users

We've added an iMessage component to our app! Easily share articles you just read with friends and family.

We also fixed a bug that showed the notification badge for some users. As always your feedback is appreciated!
Bug fixes and back end improvements. For any feedback you can find our contact information in the settings page
Bug fixes and back end improvements. For any feedback you can find our contact information in the settings page

We've added an iMessage component to our app! Easily share articles you just read with friends and family.*
*It works this time

We also fixed a bug that showed the notification badge for some users. As always your feedback is appreciated!
Mostly bug fixes. We also stopped showing outdated articles in your interest section, plus a new way to listen to podcasts from your home screen.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
Fixed crashing issue from previous release.
Fixes an issue with push alerts opening to a bank screen
Small bug fixes

Get ready for the midterm elections with ABC News. Sign up to be notified of all the important events, as well as individual races in your state. Also, you can now catch the FiveThirtyEight elections podcast in the ABC News app!

This version also fixed the issue with the listen tab not working.

Get ready for election night with ABC News! Get real time predictions from FiveThirtyEight and receive breaking news alerts throughout the evening. Customize the notifications you receive to hear about the races you care about most.

Get ready for the Democratic Primaries with ABC News. Follow the Iowa Caucus and primaries in the ABC News app with live video, real time results, and more.

Follow the Democratic Primaries with ABC News. From Super Tuesday through the convention, the ABC News app will keep you up to date with real time results, delegate tracking,  forecasts from FiveThirtyEight, and more.
